extension.name: ChronometricDate
extension.dc:description: Extension to Occurrence Core to capture chronometric dating information.

property.name: chronometricDateID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the set of information associated with a chronometricDate. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.
property.examples: GUID reference to the combination of information for one ChronometricDate

property.name: reportedAge
property.dc:description: The unconverted output of a dating protocol. For example, the conventional radiocarbon age.

property.name: reportedAgeConversionProtocol
property.dc:description: The method used for converting the reportedAge into a chronometric date, as captured in the maximumAge, maximumAgeReferenceSystem, minimumAge, and minimumAgeReferenceSystem fields. For example, calibration of conventional radiocarbon age.

property.name: maximumAge
property.dc:description: Upper limit for the age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

property.name: maximumAgeReferenceSystem
property.dc:description: The reference system associated with the maximumAge.

property.name: minimumAge
property.dc:description: Lower limit for the age of a specimen as determined by a dating method.

property.name: minimumAgeReferenceSystem
property.dc:description: The reference system associated with the minimumAge.

property.name: ageUncertaintyInYears
property.dc:description: The temporal uncertainty of the maximumAge and minimumAge, in years.

property.name: ageUncertaintyMethod
property.dc:description: The method used to generate reported uncertainty calculations.

property.name: materialDated
property.dc:description: A description of the material on which the chronometricDateProtocol was actually performed.

property.name: materialDatedID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the material on which the dating protocol was performed.
property.examples: If the material dated is not the sample itself (or even to clarify if it is), an identifier can be given.

property.name: chronometricDateProtocol
property.dc:description: A description or reference to the methods used to determine the chronometricDate.

property.name: chronometricDateReferences
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the chronometricDate.

property.name: chronometricDateRemarks
property.dc:description: Notes or comments about the chronometricDate.
